Agile Stand Heroic Avenger Monk Ranger Rogue Class Mobility Once per turn when you stand up from prone, you can also shift 1 square. This increases to up to 2 squares at 21st level.
Autohypnosis Heroic any psionic Arcana Class Healing Surge Skill Enhancement Your number of healing surges increases by 1. While you are not bloodied, when you would make an Endurance check, you can make an Arcana check instead.
Beguiling Torment Heroic any psionic Psionic Augmentation Class Forced Movement Psionics Whenever you daze or stun and enemy using a psionic power, you can spend 1 power point slide that enemy 1 square. This forced movement increases to 2 squares at 11th level. Starting at 21st level, you can automatically slide an enemy 1 square when you daze or stun that enemy, and can spend 1 power point to increase the forced movement to 3 squares.
Bloodied Concentration Heroic any psionic Psionic Augmentation Attack Bonus Bloodied Class Psionics While you are bloodied, you gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls with augmented at-will psionic attack powers.
Body Fuel Paragon Bloodline any psionic Psionic Augmentation Elan Heritage Class Elan Heritage Psionics Second Wind Once per encounter when you use your second wind, you also regain 1 power point.
Boundless Enthusiasm Epic any psionic Psionic Augmentation Class Critical Psionics The first time during an encounter that you score a critical hit, you regain 2 power points.
Brutal Flurry Paragon Monk Flurry of Blows Class Damage Bonus Whenever you target only one creature with your Flurry of Blows power, the creature takes 3 extra damage. The extra damage increases to 5 at 21st level.
Centered Intuition Paragon Monk Centered Breath Class Initiative When you roll initiative, you can roll twice and use either result. If you roll the same number both times, you can choose gain a +5 bonus to the check.
Centered Master Epic Monk Centered Breath Class Forced Movement Power Enhancement Your centered flurry of blows can slide each target 2 squares instead of 1.
Confounding Technique Paragon Monk Class Mobility Teamwork You can use a move action to switch places with an adjacent ally. This counts as a shift for both of you. If one of you has a larger space than the other, he or she can choose how to position as long as as long as he or she covers all of the other's previous space. The one with the smaller space can position himself or herself anywhere inside the larger one's previous space.
Crack the Mountain Heroic Monk Stone Fist Class Condition Infliction Forced Movement Power Enhancement When you hit an enemy with a daily attack power, the enemy is also slowed (save ends). If the attack already slows the enemy, you instead slide the enemy 2 squares.
Crashing Tempest Style Heroic Monk Flurry of Blows Class Damage Bonus Weapon Specialization While you are wielding a club, you gain a +2 bonus to the damage deals by your Flurry of Blows power.
Critical Reserve Paragon any psionic Psionic Augmentation Class Critical Power Recovery Psionics Once per encounter, when you score a critical hit with an at-will psionic power that is unaugmented, you regain 1 power point.
Crystalline Auger Heroic Shardmind any psionic Class Psychic Racial Your attacks ignore 5 points of resist psychic. This increases to 10 at 11th level, and to 15 at 21st level.
Cull the Weak Paragon Striker Bloodied Enemy Class Combat Advantage Damage Bonus When you have combat advantage against a bloodied or weakened enemy, you gain a +2 bonus to melee damage rolls against that enemy. This bonus increases to +4 at 21st level.
Dancing Thorn Style Heroic Eladrin Monk Flurry of Blows Attack Bonus Class Damage Bonus Racial Weapon Specialization While wielding a longsword, you gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls with Monk attack powers. Also, if you wield a longsword in two hands, you add +1 to the damage dealt by your Flurry of Blows power.
Daring Warrior Heroic Charisma13 any martial Monk Class Combat Advantage Damage Bonus Triggered You gain the following benefits with at-will Martial attacks or monk at-will attacks: If an enemy hits you with an attack triggered by your movement, you gain a +1 bonus to damage against that creature until the end of your current turn. If an enemy hits you when it has combat advantage for the attack, you gain a +1 bonus to damage against that creature until the end of your next turn. These bonuses stack with each other. Both bonuses increase to +2 at 11th level, and to +3 at 21st level.
Darkening Mind Heroic Shadar-kay shadow jaunt any psionic Psionic Augmentation Class Damage Resistance Power Enhancement Psionics Racial Teleportation Your shadow jaunt racial power gains the Augmentable keyword and the following augmentation: Augment 1: You add 2 squares to the distance you can teleport, and you remain insubstantial until the end of your next turn.
Darkfire Reaper Epic Drow darkfire any martial Striker Class Kill Effect Power Recovery Racial When you reduce the target of your darkfire racial power to 0 hit points or less with a melee or ranged attack, you regain the use of darkfire.
Dazing Fist Paragon Monk Stone Fist Class Condition Infliction Power Enhancement When you hit an enemy with a daily attack power, you also daze the enemy (save ends). If the attack already dazes an enemy, it instead deals 5 additional damage. This additional damage increases to 10 at 21st level.
Defiler's Rejuvenation Epic Arcane Defiling arcane defiling any psionic Psionic Augmentation Arcane Defiling Class Power Recovery Psionics Triggered When your arcane defiling power deals damage to one or more of your allies, you regain 2 power points.
Desperate Renewal Paragon any psionic Psionic Augmentation Bloodied Class Power Recovery Psionics Second Wind If you are bloodied when you use your second wind, you can choose to regain 2 power points instead of regaining hit points.
Destructive Power Heroic 6th Controller Striker Class Damage Bonus Power Repertoire You can exchange any 6th-level or higher utility power you know for destructive power.
Destructive Power Feat Utility 6 By funneling greater power into your attack, you ensure its effect is not wasted Daily Free Interrupt
Trigger: You roll a 1 on any damage die when you hit with an area or close attack, or a daily attack
true Effect: You reroll any result of 1 on a d4 or d6 damage die until the die roll is something other than 1, or reroll any result of 1 or 2 on another damage die until the die roll is something other than 1 or 2.
Disciplined Killer Heroic Assassin Monk assassin's shroud a Flurry of Blows Class Combination Damage Bonus Power Enhancement When you use your Flurry of Blows against a creature that has any of your shrouds on it, you deal +1 additional damage to it for each shroud. This additional damage increases to +2 at 21st level. Also, once per round when you use your Flurry of Blows against just one creature that does not have your shrouds on it, you can add 1 shroud to it.
Dragon's Grasp Paragon Monk Attack Bonus Class Grapple Reactive Strikes You gain a +2 feat bonus to attack rolls with grab. In addition, when you are wielding no weapons, you can make a grab in place of a melee basic attack on a reactive strike.
Draw First Blood Heroic Intelligence13 any martial Monk Basic Attack Class Damage Bonus Your basic attacks against enemies at full hit points deal additional damage equal to your Intelligence modifier. This additional damage increases to 2 + your Intelligence modifier at 11th level, and to 4 + your Intelligence modifier at 21st level.
Driving Rain Paragon Monk Attack Bonus Class Forced Movement You gain a +2 feat bonus to attack rolls with bull rush. Also, when you hit with bull rush, you push the target a number of squares equal to your speed. For each square you push the target, you can shift 1 square to a square adjacent to the target.
Dual Mind Reserves Paragon Kalashtar any psionic Psionic Augmentation Class Power Recovery Psionics Racial Second Wind When you use your second wind, you also regain 1 power point.
Eager Mind Heroic Human any psionic Bloodied Class Initiative Racial Saving Throws You gain a +2 bonus to Initiative. In addition, you gain a +1 bonus to saving throws while you are bloodied.
Effortless Motion Paragon Monk Class Defense Power Enhancement Whenever you use a Movement Technique from an monk at-will power, you gain a +1 bonus to AC until the end of your next turn. When you reach 21st level, choose Fortitude, Reflex, or Will. You also gain a +1 bonus to that defense when you gain the bonus to AC from this feat.
Elemental Recovery Heroic Genasi Elemental Manifestation any psionic Psionic Augmentation Class Damage Resistance Psionics Triggered When you would take damage that has a type and you have not yet expended the racial power from your Elemental Manifestation racial trait, you can expend 1 power point as an immediate interrupt to gain resist 5 to the triggering damage type or types until the start of your next turn. The resist increases to 10 at 11th level, and to 15 at 21st level.
Elusive Movement Paragon any shadow Monk Ranger Rogue Class Defense Mobility Whenever you end your turn at least 3 squares away from where you began your turn, you gain a +1 bonus to AC and Reflex until the start of your next turn.
Empty Vessel Paragon any psionic Psionic Augmentation Attack Bonus Class Defense Psionics Triggered The first time you drop to 0 power points during an encounter, you gain a +2 bonus to attack rolls, and to Fortitude, Reflex and Will. These bonuses last until the end of your next turn.
Enlightened Stone Heroic Goliath stone's endurance any psionic Class Defense Power Enhancement Psionics Skill Enhancement When you make an Athletics check, you can use your Constitution modifier instead of your Strength modifier. Also, if you have at least 1 power point when you use your stone's endurance racial power, you also gain a +2 bonus to Will until the end of your next turn.
Enlightened Transformation Heroic Shifter any psionic razorclaw shifting Class Defense Power Enhancement Racial Shapechange Skill Enhancement While under the effects of your razorclaw shifting racial power, you also gain a +1 bonus to Will and a +3 bonus to Insight checks.
Far Realm's Blessing Epic Bloodline any psionic Psionic Augmentation Foulborn Heritage Bloodied Class Foulborn Heritage Power Recovery Psionics Triggered The first time you become bloodied in an encounter, you regain 1 power point.
Fearsome Flurry Heroic Bloodline Monk Flurry of Blows Foulborn Heritage Attack Penalty Class Power Enhancement When you use the power granted by your Flurry of Blows class feature, you can choose to have a target take a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn instead of the normal effect.
Fey Gambit Paragon Eladrin fey step Assassin Monk Rogue Class Combat Advantage Racial Teleportation When you use your fey step racial power to teleport adjacent to an enemy, you gain combat advantage against that enemy until the end of your next turn.
Flowing River Style Heroic Halfling Monk second chance Class Mobility Power Enhancement Racial When a Monk power allows you to shift and you have not expended your second chance racial power, you can enter enemies' spaces during this shift. You must still end the movement in an unoccupied square.
Fluid Motion Heroic Monk Class Mobility You gain a +1 feat bonus to speed. This bonus increases to +2 at 11th level.
Flurry Resounding Heroic Monk Flurry of Blows Action Point Class Damage Bonus When you spend an action point to take an extra action and use your Flurry of Blows as part of that action, it does not count towards your normal limit of using it only once per turn.
Form Mastery Epic Monk Action Point Class Power Recovery When you spend an action point to take an extra action, you also regain the use of a monk encounter attack power you have expended. You can use the recovered attack as your extra action.
Four-Armed Flurry Heroic Thri-kreen Monk Flurry of Blows Class Damage Bonus Power Enhancement Racial When you use the power granted by your Flurry of Blows class feature, your attack deals 2 extra damage to one of the power's targets. The extra damage increases to 4 at 11th level. Starting at 21st level, you can apply the extra damage to two of the power's targets.
Get in Your Head Heroic Gnome fade away any psionic Psionic Augmentation Class Power Enhancement Psionics Racial Teleportation Your fade away racial power gains the Augmentable keyword and the following augmentation: Augment 1: The power gains the Teleportation keyword, and you can teleport 3 squares after becoming invisible.
Gift of the Eternal Epic Bloodline any psionic Psionic Augmentation Elan Heritage Class Elan Heritage Power Recovery Psionics At the end of your first turn in each encounter, you regain 1 power point.
Grave Flurry Heroic Revenant Monk Flurry of Blows Class Necrotic Racial Triggered Whenever you use your Flurry of Blows power, you can choose to forgo dealing damage to instead negate the target's necrotic damage (if any) until the end of your next turn.
Guarded Practice Heroic any martial Monk Class Defense Power Enhancement Skill Enhancement You gain a +2 feat bonus to Insight checks. Also, whenever you hit an enemy with a martial at-will attack or a monk at-will attack, until the start of your next turn, you do not count as flanked by the target you hit. Other creatures can still flank you, including with the target you hit.
Haunting Sounds Heroic Gnome any psionic Psionic Augmentation ghost sound Class Combat Advantage Power Enhancement Psionics Racial While you have at least 1 power point remaining, you can use your ghost sound racial power at-will. Also, your ghost sound racial power gains the Augmentable keyword and the following augment: Augment 1: You gain combat advantage against one enemy adjacent to the target object or square on the first attack you make before the end of your current turn.
Healing Fist Heroic Githzerai Monk Class Damage Bonus Racial Second Wind When you use your second wind, you gain a bonus to damage rolls with monk attacks equal to your Wisdom modifier. The bonus to damage remains until the end of your next turn. The bonus to damage increases to 2 + your Wisdom modifier at 11th level, and to 5 + your Wisdom modifier at 21st level.
Heedless Thought Heroic Minotaur Heedless Charge any psionic Charge Class Defense Racial The bonus to AC granted by your Heedless Charge racial trait increases by one-half your [Constitution or Wisdom] modifier (minimum +1). s
Hellmind Scorn Heroic Tiefling any psionic Class Damage Bonus Forced Movement Psychic Racial When an enemy successfully saves against a Psychic effect bestowed by you, you can use a free reaction to slide that enemy 1 square and make it gain vulnerable 5 psychic until the end of your next turn. Starting at 11th level, the vulnerable increases to 7. Starting at 21st level, you can slide the enemy up to 2 squares, and the vulnerable increases to 10.
Human Ingenuity Heroic Human any psionic Psionic Augmentation Action Point Class Power Recovery Psionics Racial When you spend an action point, you regain 1 power point.
Improved Monk Unarmed Strike Heroic Monk Unarmed Combatant Class Damage Bonus Unarmed Combat You gain a +1 feat bonus to damage rolls with Weapon attacks using your Monk Unarmed Strike and with Monk Implement powers when using your unarmed strike as an implement, and to the damage dealt by your Flurry of Blows power when using your unarmed strike to deliver it. This bonus to damage increases to +2 at 11th level, and to +3 at 21st level.
Infectious Wrath Heroic Dragonborn Dragonborn Fury any psionic Attack Bonus Bloodied Racial Support The first time in an encounter that you are bloodied, each ally within 5 squares of you gains a +1 bonus to attack rolls until the end of his or her next turn.
Internalize the Basic Kata Heroic Monk Flurry of Blows Unarmed Combatant Attack Bonus Basic Attack Class Damage Bonus Reactive Strikes Unarmed Combat You can use your Dexterity modifier instead of your Strength modifier for attack rolls and damage rolls when making a melee basic attack with your monk unarmed strike. Also, your Flurry of Blows power can be triggered when you hit with a reactive strike made with your monk unarmed strike.
Io's Roar Heroic Dragonborn any psionic dragon breath dragonfear Damage Bonus Power Enhancement Racial Psychic Any target hit by your dragon breath racial power or your dragonfear racial power gains vulnerable 5 psychic until the end of your current turn. This vulnerable increases to 7 at 11th level, and to 10 at 21st level.
Iron Parry Heroic Monk Iron Soul Class Defense When you are wielding a weapon (other than your monk unarmed strike), and wearing cloth armor or no armor, and not using a shield, you gain a +1 bonus to AC.
Iron Resolve of Zerthadlun Heroic Githzerai any psionic Psionic Augmentation Bloodied Class Psionics Racial Saving Throws While you have at least 1 power point, you gain a +1 feat bonus to saving throws. This increases to +2 while you are bloodied.
Keep Your Feet Paragon Monk Class Condition Negation When you are knocked prone, you can use an immediate reaction to stand up.
Ki Focus Expertise Heroic Assassin Monk Vampire Dexterity13 Bloodied Enemy Damage Bonus Implement Specialization You gain a +1 bonus to damage rolls against bloodied enemies with attacks you make using a ki focus. The bonus to damage increases to +2 at 11th level, and to +3 at 21st level.
Martial Alacrity Heroic Dexterity15 any martial Monk Class Initiative Mobility You gain a +2 feat bonus to initiative checks. Also, during your first turn you can step as a minor action.
Master's Instruction Paragon Monk Attack Bonus Class Miss Mitigation Support When you use a monk encounter attack power and miss at least one target, choose one ally you can see and one target you missed. The chosen ally gains a +2 bonus to his or her first attack roll against the chosen target before the end of your next turn.
Mindfire Heroic Drow darkfire any psionic Psionic Augmentation Class Power Enhancement Psionics Racial Your darkfire racial power gains the Augmentable keyword and the following augmentation: Augment 1: You can target Reflex or Will, your choice, and on a hit the target also treats creatures more than 5 squares away from it as having total concealment until the end of your next turn.
Monastic Vampire Heroic Monk Vampire Class Combination Defense Healing Surge Mobility Triggered Once per encounter, when you hit at least one enemy with a monk encounter attack, you gain a healing surge. Also, when you spend a healing surge, you become invigorated until the end of your next turn. While invigorated, you gain a +2 bonus to speed and a +4 bonus to all defenses against attacks triggered by your movement.
Opportunistic Footwork Heroic Dexterity13 any martial Monk Class Mobility Reactive Strikes When an enemy provokes a reactive strike from you, you can choose to shift 1 square instead of making a melee basic attack. This increases to shift 2 squares at 21st level.
Opportunity Knocks Heroic Rogue Monk Class Combat Advantage Reactive Strikes Triggered When you either hit with an enemy with a reactive strike or an enemy misses you with a reactive strike, that enemy grants combat advantage to you until the end of your next turn.
Piercing Palm Heroic Monk Monk Unarmed Strike Rogue Sneak Attack Class Combination Unarmed Combat You can deal your Sneak Attack damage with your monk unarmed strike, including with Monk attacks when you use your monk unarmed strike as the implement for them. Also, you can use your monk unarmed strike with Rogue and Rogue paragon path powers and features that require the use of a Light Blade.
Pointed Step Style Heroic Monk Flurry of Blows Class Power Enhancement Weapon Specialization When your Flurry of Blows power is triggered by an attack you make with a Spear, one target of that power can be up to 2 squares away from you.
Precision Throw Heroic any martial Monk Attack Bonus Basic Attack Class Damage Bonus Weapon Specialization Whenever you make a ranged basic attack using a thrown weapon that you have proficiency with, you can always use Dexterity for the attack roll and damage roll, even if the weapon has the Heavy Thrown property.
Prescient Dodge Paragon any psionic Psionic Augmentation Class Defense Initiative Psionics At the start of each encounter, you gain a +2 bonus to all defenses until the start of your first turn (after any surprise round, if applicable). Also, whenever you hit an enemy with an unaugmented psionic at-will attack power, you can spend 1 power point to gain a +2 power bonus to all defenses until the start of your next turn.
Psiforged Resolve Heroic Warforged warforged resolve any psionic Psionic Augmentation Bloodied Class Power Enhancement Psionics Racial When you are bloodied and use your warforged resolve racial power, you can choose to regain 1 power point instead of regaining hit points. The number of power points you regain increases to 2 at 21st level.
Psionic Accuracy Heroic Elf elven accuracy any psionic Psionic Augmentation Class Combat Advantage Power Enhancement Psionics Racial Your elven accuracy racial power gains the Augmentable keyword with the following augment: Augment 1: You gain combat advantage against the target of the triggering attack roll until the end of your next turn.
Psionic Celerity Heroic any psionic Psionic Augmentation Charge Class Mobility Psionics Whenever you run or charge, you gain a +2 bonus to speed. This does not stack with the Fast Runner feat. As part of any movement, you can spend 1 power point to gain a +2 bonus to speed until the end of your current turn.
Psionic Defiling Paragon Arcane Defiling any psionic any psionic Arcane Defiling Power Enhancement You gain the arcane defiling power and can use it with psionic daily attack powers. If you have other feats or abilities that affect your arcane defiling, those now affect your psionic powers in addition to arcane powers.
Psionic Ferocity Heroic Minotaur Ferocity any psionic Psionic Augmentation Class Damage Bonus Psionics Racial Triggered When you make an attack as part of your Ferocity racial trait, you can spend 1 power point to deal +1[W] extra damage, or +1d8 extra damage if your attack is not a Weapon attack.
Psionic Fortune Heroic any psionic Psionic Augmentation Class Psionics Saving Throws While you have at least 1 power point, you gain a +1 bonus to saving throws. Also, when you make a saving throw on your turn, you can spend 1 power point to gain a +2 feat bonus to saving throws until the end of your current turn.
Psionic Fury Heroic Half-orc furious assault any psionic Psionic Augmentation Class Damage Bonus Power Enhancement Psionics Racial Your furious assault racial power gains the Augmentable keyword, and the following augment: Augment 1:You deal damage to each enemy adjacent to you equal to your [Strength or Dexterity] modifier. If the triggering attack was made with a Weapon or Implement, you add its enhancement bonus to the damage. If the triggering attack deals a type of damage, your furious assault gains the corresponding keyword and this damage is of the same time.
Psionic Initiative Heroic any psionic Psionic Augmentation Class Initiative Psionics You gain a +3 feat bonus to Initiative checks. Also, when you roll initiative, you can spend 1 power point to increase this to a +6 feat bonus.
Psionic Reflexes Heroic any psionic Psionic Augmentation Attack Bonus Class Psionics Reactive Strikes You gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls with reactive strikes. Also, when you make a reactive strike, you can spend 1 power point to gain a +2 power bonus to the attack roll.
Psionic Rejuvenation Paragon Shardmind any psionic Psionic Augmentation Class Power Recovery Psionics Racial Second Wind When you use your second wind, you also regain 1 power point.
Psionic Rush Paragon any psionic Psionic Augmentation Action Point Class Psionics When you spend an action point to take an extra action, you can reduce the cost to augment any augmentable power you use during that action by 1 power point.
Psionic Scorn Heroic Warlock Sorcer-King Pact any psionic Psionic Augmentation Class Combination Power Recovery Psionics When you use your fell might recovery class power, you can choose to regain 1 power point instead of regaining your fell might.
Psionic Skill Heroic any psionic Psionic Augmentation Class Psionics Skill Enhancement Choose any skill. You gain a +2 feat bonus to checks with that skill. Also, when you make a check with the chosen skill, you can spend 1 power point to gain a +3 power bonus to that check. You can take this feat more than one. Each time you take this feat, you must choose a different skill.
Psionic Toughness Heroic any psionic Psionic Augmentation Class Hit Points Psionics Second Wind You gain 3 additional hit points. These additional hit points increase to 6 at 11th level, and to 10 at 21st level. Also, your when you use your second wind, you regain an additional 5 hit points. These additional hit points regained increase to 10 at 11th level, and to 15 at 21st level.
Psionic Trick Heroic Changeling any psionic changeling trick Class Combat Advantage Defense Movement Power Racial Your movement does not provoke reactive strikes from enemies granting combat advantage to you. Also, you do not provoke reactive strikes at all from a target under the effects of your changeling trick racial power.
Psionic Vampire Heroic Vampire any psionic Psionic Augmentation Class Combination Healing Surge Psionics Once per encounter, when you hit at least one enemy with an augmented psionic attack, you gain a healing surge. Once per encounter, you can use a minor action to spend a healing surge to gain 2 power points. These power points expire at the end of your current turn.
Psychic Corruption of Malbolge Heroic Tiefling any psionic Psionic Augmentation Class Damage Bonus Fire Racial Psychic After you hit an enemy with an augmented psionic power, that enemy gains vulnerable 2 fire and vulnerable 2 psychic against your powers until the end of your next turn. Both of these vulnerables increase to 4 at 11th level, and to 6 at 21st level.
Psychic Feast Heroic Shifter any psionic longtooth shifting Class Healing Power Enhancement Racial Once per turn while you are under the effects of your longtooth shifting racial power and hit with a psionic attack on your, you immediately regain a number of hit points equal to one-half your regeneration value.
Psychic Wail Paragon any psionic Class Combat Advantage Kill Effect Psychic When you reduce an enemy to 0 hit points or fewer on your turn with a power that has the Psychic keyword, choose one other enemy you can see within 5 squares of the first enemy. You gain combat advantage against the chosen enemy until the end of your next turn.
Resurgent Memory Heroic Deva memory of a thousand lifetimes any psionic Attack Bonus Class Power Enhancement Racial Skill Enhancement When you use your memory of a thousand lifetimes racial power to enhance an Arcana check, or to enhance an attack roll of a psionic power, you add +1 to the result.
Risky Shift Heroic Avenger Ranger Rogue Monk Class Mobility Whenever you shift, you can choose to increase the maximum distance by 1 square. If you do, you grant combat advantage until the start of your next turn.
Roundabout Charge Paragon Monk Rogue Acrobatics Charging Class When you charge, each square of your movement need not bring you closer to the target of your charge, but you must start the charge at least 3 squares away from the target.
Seeking Power Heroic 6th Controller Striker Attack Bonus Class Power Repertoire You can exchange any 6th-level or higher utility power you know for seeking power.
Seeking Power Feat Utility Infusing your attack with greater power reduces the risk that intervening obstructions can foil it Encounter Minor Action
Effect: The first ranged attack roll you make before the end of your next turn ignores all concealment and cover.
If the attack misses, you regain the use of this power at the start of your next turn.
Serenity in Simplicity Paragon Monk Attack Bonus Class When all your monk daily attack powers are expended, you gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls with monk at-will attack powers. If you have the Internalize the Basic Kata feat, you also gain the bonus to attack rolls with melee basic attacks using your monk unarmed strike.
Shard Link Heroic Shardmind Telepathy any psionic Class Combat Advantage Racial Support Telepathy Once during each of your turns, when you make an attack against an enemy that you have combat advantage against, choose one ally within the range of your Telepathy racial trait. The chosen ally gains combat advantage on the first attack he or she makes against the same enemy before the start of your next turn.
Shielding Whirlwind Style Heroic Monk Flurry of Blows Class Defense Weapon Specialization When you use your Flurry of Blows power while you are wielding a quarterstaff, you gain cover against ranged attack and area attacks until the end of your next turn or until you are no longer wielding a quarterstaff. You also do not grant combat advantage for being flanked while you have this benefit, though you still count as being flanked for other purposes.
Shifting Stone Heroic Dwarf Stand Your Ground Monk Class Mobility Racial Triggered When you succeed in a saving throw to avoid being knocked prone, you can shift a number of squares equal to your Wisdom modifier as a free reaction.
Simple Precision Paragon Monk Attack Bonus Class Whenever you hit with a monk at-will attack power or a melee basic attack, you gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls with monk attacks until the end of your next turn.
Skipping Stone Flurry Heroic Monk Flurry of Blows Class Power Enhancement Weapon Specialization When you use your Flurry of Blows power and are wielding a loaded Sling, one of the targets can be within 10 squares of you. This counts as a ranged attack that does not provoke reactive strikes and uses the ammunition from your Sling.
Skittering Mouse Style Heroic Small or smaller Monk Class Mobility Size-based When you use a monk power to shift 3 or more squares, you can shift through enemies' spaces.
Slashing Kama Style Heroic Monk Flurry of Blows Class Ongoing Damage Power Enhancement Proficiency Gain Weapon Specialization You gain proficiency with the sickle Also, when you use your Flurry of Blows power and are wielding a sickle, you can choose one of the targets. If you do, the chosen target instead takes ongoing damage (save ends) equal to the damage you would normally deal to it.
Speedy Response Heroic Dexterity15 Avenger Rogue Monk Class Mobility Triggered If you are hit by an attack while moving, you gain a +1 bonus to speed for that movement. This bonus is cumulative if you are hit multiple times.
Starblade Flurry Paragon Monk Flurry of Blows Class Weapon Specialization When you use your Flurry of Blows class power, one of the targets can be within 5 squares of you. This is a ranged attack with a Dagger or a shuriken, and doesn't trigger reactive strikes for making a ranged attack. Starting at 21st level, the one ranged target is in addition to enemies adjacent to you.
Still Water Paragon Monk Class Defense If all your monk encounter attack powers are expended and you hit with a monk at-will attack, you gain a +2 bonus to AC until the start of your next turn.
Stone Fist Master Epic Monk Stone Fist Class Combat Advantage Power Enhancement Each target of your stone fist flurry of blows class power grants combat advantage for the first attack made against that creature before the end of your next turn.
Surprise Action Epic Wisdom19 Monk Ranger Rogue Class Initiative During the surprise round, if you aren't surprised, you can a standard action, a move action, and a minor action.
Sword of Civilization Heroic Striker Erathis Class Combat Advantage Damage Bonus Support Worship When you have combat advantage against an enemy, allies adjacent to you have a +2 bonus to damage rolls against that enemy. This bonus to damage increases to +4 at 11th level, and to +6 at 21st level.
Threefold Fortitude Paragon any psionic Psionic Augmentation Class Defense Psionics You gain a +1 bonus to Fortitude. On your turn as a free action, you can spend 1 power point to gain an additional +2 bonus to Fortitude until the end of your next turn.
Threefold Reflex Paragon any psionic Psionic Augmentation Class Defense Psionics You gain a +1 bonus to Reflex. On your turn as a free action, you can spend 1 power point to gain an additional +2 bonus to Reflex until the end of your next turn.
Threefold Will Paragon any psionic Psionic Augmentation Class Defense Psionics You gain a +1 bonus to Will. On your turn as a free action, you can spend 1 power point to gain an additional +2 bonus to Will until the end of your next turn.
Thri-Kreen Wild Talent Heroic Thri-kreen thri-kreen claws any psionic Psionic Augmentation Class Power Recovery Power Repertoire Psionics You gain one Wild Talent power of your choice. Also, once per encounter, you can use the following action: You expend your thri-kreen claws racial power to regain 1 power point.
True Freedom Epic Monk Class Grapple Triggered You can use the following action at-will: You are grabbedYou take the escape action.
Ubiquitous Fey Step Paragon Eladrin fey step any psionic Psionic Augmentation Class Power Recovery Psionics Racial When you first drop to 0 power points during an encounter, you regain the use of your fey step racial power.
